home.title: Reviving Syria's Heritage
home.subtitle: One Mosque at a Time
home.description: An initiative to document Syrian mosque restoration achievements, showcase projects needing funding, and receive supporter applications

projects.description: Browse all mosque reconstruction and restoration projects

actions.addMosqueDesc: Register a new mosque in the system

about.title: About the Initiative
about.subtitle: Learn about the Reviving Syria's Heritage initiative and its mission to reconstruct historical mosques

hero.title: Reviving Syria's Heritage Initiative
hero.description: We work to document and reconstruct historical mosques in Syria, preserving our cultural and religious heritage for future generations

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We strive to revive Islamic architectural heritage in Syria by documenting damaged mosques and organizing reconstruction and restoration efforts with transparency and high professionalism

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the primary reference in documenting and reconstructing Syrian mosques, contributing to preserving Syria's cultural and religious identity

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We commit to complete transparency in all our financial and administrative operations

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We preserve the original architectural character of historical mosques

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We ensure the highest quality standards in restoration and reconstruction work

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work as a team with all partners and volunteers

objectives.title: Our Objectives
objectives.documentation: Comprehensive documentation of all damaged mosques in Syria
objectives.reconstruction: Reconstruction and restoration of mosques according to heritage standards
objectives.fundraising: Fundraising from diverse and reliable sources
objectives.transparency: Ensuring transparency in the use of donations
objectives.community: Engaging the community in the reconstruction process

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Our team includes elite engineers, architects, and experts in Islamic heritage

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.description: Since the initiative's launch, we have achieved significant milestones in reconstruction

2020.title: Initiative Launch
2020.description: Establishment of the initiative and beginning of initial documentation work

2021.title: First Reconstruction Project
2021.description: Completion of the first historical mosque reconstruction project

2022.title: Scope Expansion
2022.description: Expanding work to include new governorates

2024.title: Digital Platform
2024.description: Launch of the comprehensive digital platform

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We work with local and international partners to achieve our goals

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For inquiries and participation in the initiative

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to answer your inquiries and help you participate in the Reviving Syria's Heritage initiative
